snippet.title: QL | JUMP: The David Bowie Interactive CD-ROM (1994) an Interactive Music Album
snippet.description:
Experience David Bowie's musical vision in this interactive CD-ROM. Make a music video. Mix the music. Explore. Interact. Sculpt the album of the future with the power of your creativity. Don't be passive; be interactive. Experience the fusion of music, video, and interactivity in a creative explosion of merging multimedia. The future of music is here - and it's in your hands.

Welcome to the 90s , when for over a decade ... 10 years , the QT MAC evolution with Macromedia ruled the scene to bring out the most creative people together to make products ... the evolution of Hypercard , that gave people the golden era of Adventures and Interactive Experiences ... till we hit Unity and Unreal shit show of no talent scram crap games ...

This Video is a part of my Cynical Games Review Site : https://gbacklog.blogspot.com/
You can also find me here : 
https://www.bitchute.com/channel/hfric/
https://twitter.com/HfricGB
frictionomatic@tutanota.com
